content.question: Based on the data, which of the following is the most likely consequence for the legislative process in Congress?

choices.label: More competitive races for House seats in the general election
A decrease in party-line voting on important legislation introduced in the House
An increase in gridlock and failure to compromise on legislation
Greater cooperation between Congress and the president on nominations

content.answer: An increase in gridlock and failure to compromise on legislation

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
